  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account​(java.lang.String handle, java.lang.String description) throws InvalidHandleException, IllegalHandleException
      Constructor for SocialMediaPlatform accounts.
      Parameters:
      handle - the handle provided for the new account object.
      description - the description provided for the new account object.
      Throws:
      InvalidHandleException - thrown if the new handle is empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces.
      IllegalHandleException - if the handle already exists in the platform.

    • Account

      public Account​(java.lang.String handle) throws InvalidHandleException, IllegalHandleException
      Constructor for miniSocialMediaPlatform accounts.
      Parameters:
      handle - the handle provided for the new account object.
      Throws:
      InvalidHandleException - thrown if the new handle is empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces.
      IllegalHandleException - if the handle already exists in the platform.

    • setHandle

      public void setHandle​(java.lang.String handle) throws InvalidHandleException, IllegalHandleException
      Sets new handle for an account object.
      Parameters:
      handle - the new handle.
      Throws:
      InvalidHandleException - thrown if the new handle is empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces.
      IllegalHandleException - if the handle already exists in the platform.

    • isHandleValid

      public static void isHandleValid​(java.lang.String handle) throws InvalidHandleException
      Validation method to check if provided handle can be used (not empty, no spaces, less than 30 chars).
      Parameters:
      handle - the unique non-empty name of the account holder.
      Throws:
      InvalidHandleException - thrown if the new handle is empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces.
